name: mautic
description: Mautic is an open-source marketing automation platform that helps teams create email campaigns, segments, and landing pages. It supports automation workflows, customer tracking, and can be run fully self-hosted.
features: Email campaigns: Design and send marketing emails with drag-and-drop builder and templates.
Marketing automation: Create workflows that trigger actions based on user behavior and conditions.
Lead scoring: Assign points to contacts based on interactions to identify sales-ready leads.
Segmentation: Group contacts by demographics, behavior, or custom criteria for targeted campaigns.
Landing pages: Build and publish landing pages with forms to capture leads without external tools.
A/B testing: Test different email subject lines, content, or send times to optimize performance.
Contact management: Store and organize contact information with custom fields and tags.
Campaign tracking: Monitor email opens, clicks, and conversions with detailed analytics.
Form builder: Create web forms to capture leads and automatically add them to Mautic.
Social monitoring: Track social media mentions and engage with contacts across platforms.
API integration: Connect Mautic with CRM, e-commerce, or other tools via REST API.
Multi-channel campaigns: Coordinate marketing across email, SMS, social media, and web notifications.
